updated_cases.title: Validate suppression with TSS + User alert
updated_cases.custom_summary:
\---|- Warning \---|-  
TestLink Warning  
test case name is too long (109 chars) > 100 => has been truncated  
Original name  
Set the policy for TSS with activity as upload/download  
with action as user_alert with suppress flag set as 1  
\---|- \***| \---|-  
Set the policy for TSS with activity as upload/download with action as user_alert with suppress flag set as 1

custom_steps_separated.content: 1. create TSS policy in WebUI 2. Set action as user\_alert 3. activity as upload/download 4. Try to upload/download multiple TSS files 5. Set user\_alert suppress flag as 1
custom_steps_separated.expected: It should trigger single user_alert notification for the timeout limit set(60 sec) for any specfic file while upload/download.

updated_cases.title: Validate suppression for browse activity with block option with user alert template
updated_cases.custom_summary:
\---|- Warning \---|-  
TestLink Warning  
test case name is too long (132 chars) > 100 => has been truncated  
Original name  
Set the policy for url_filtering predefined category with   
activity as browse with action as user_alert with   
suppress flag set as 1  
\---|- \***| \---|-  
Set the policy for url\_filtering predefined category with activity as browse with action as user\_alert with suppress flag set as 1

custom_steps_separated.content: 1. create url\_filtering predefined category policy in WebUI 2. Set action as user\_alert 3. activity as browse 4. Set user\_alert suppress flag as 1 5. Try to browse same site multiple times 6. In user\_alert pop up click on proceed button with suitable justification.
custom_steps_separated.expected: It should allow us to access the website any number of times with out another suppress user alert notification within suppress interval set.

updated_cases.title: Validate suppression with DLP + User alert + Upload with different DLP files
updated_cases.custom_summary:
\---|- Warning \---|-  
TestLink Warning  
test case name is too long (109 chars) > 100 => has been truncated  
Original name  
Set the policy for DLP with activity as upload/download  
with action as user_alert with suppress flag set as 1  
\---|- \***| \---|-  
Set the policy for DLP with activity as upload/download with action as user_alert with suppress flag set as 1

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. create DLP policy in WebUI 2. Set action as user\_alert 3. activity as upload/download 4. Try to upload/download multiple DLP files 5. Set user\_alert suppress flag as 1

6 In suppress user alert pop up, provide suitable justification and click on proceed button.
custom_steps_separated.expected: It should upload/download that particular DLP file for which we have given justification and clicked on proceed button . Rest other DLP files should be blocked from upload/download.

updated_cases.title: Validate suppression with TSS + User alert + Upload with different TSS files
updated_cases.custom_summary:
\---|- Warning \---|-  
TestLink Warning  
test case name is too long (109 chars) > 100 => has been truncated  
Original name  
Set the policy for TSS with activity as upload/download  
with action as user_alert with suppress flag set as 1  
\---|- \***| \---|-  
Set the policy for TSS with activity as upload/download with action as user_alert with suppress flag set as 1

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. create TSS policy in WebUI 2. Set action as user\_alert 3. activity as upload/download 4. Try to upload/download multiple TSS files 5. Set user\_alert suppress flag as 1

6. provide suitable justification in suppress user alert pop up and click on proceed button.
custom_steps_separated.expected: It should upload/download only that file for which we have provided justification and clicked on proceed button and rest other files should be blocked to upload/download.

\---|- Warning \---|-  
TestLink Warning  
test case name is too long (110 chars) > 100 => has been truncated  
Original name  
Set the policy for url_filtering with activity as browse  
with action as user_alert with suppress flag set as 1  
\---|- \***| \---|-  
Set the policy for url\_filtering with activity as browse with action as user\_alert with suppress flag set as 1

custom_steps_separated.content: 1. create url\_filtering policy in WebUI 2. Set action as user\_alert 3. activity as browse 4. Set user\_alert suppress flag as 1 5. Try to browse same site multiple times 6. In user\_alert pop up click on back for each time we browse website
custom_steps_separated.expected: It should trigger single user_alert notification for the timeout limit set(60 sec) with text as " "repeated notifications for this activity for the same app will be suppressed for x seconds" where x is the suppression interval"
